description: An interactive view of your energy consumption, production, and environment.

targets.query: SELECT count("battery_instant_power") FROM "http" WHERE ("battery_instant_power" > 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(none)
SELECT count("battery_instant_power") FROM "http" WHERE ("battery_instant_power" < 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)
SELECT mean("clouds_all") FROM "weather" GROUP BY time(1h) fill(none)
SELECT mean("battery_instant_power") FROM "http" WHERE ("battery_instant_power" > 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(none)
SELECT mean("solar_instant_power") AS "solar" FROM "http" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(none)

title: Powerwall History
